name: Create Own ShortCode
author: Venugopal

sections.description:
This plugin helpful for create your own shortcode for your content and image . You can put this short code in post, page, widget.. etc

More WordPress help please follow below link https://venugopalphp.wordpress.com/

PHP Requirements

Create Own Short Code plugin 5.2 and newer require PHP5.3 Create Own Short Code plugin 5.1.1 and older require PHP5.2
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ add new menu in WordPress

  2. After activation the plugin

  3. Option show on above setting option
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Select Image shortcode or content shortcode from sidebar
  • Create your desired content and image click create shortcode. it will create shortcode you can use the anywhere
